sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper rship IP:IP
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT Base_CorrelationID , 'Switch' AS Base_AssetType , Base_Name , Base_SerialNumber , Base_MACAddress , relationship , Dependant_CorrelationID , Dependant_Name , Dependant_SerialNumber , Dependant_MACAddress , CASE
WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Citrix XenServer' THEN 'Citrix' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'ESXi server' THEN 'ESX' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Firewall' THEN 'Firewall' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Linux' THEN 'Linux' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Music system' THEN 'Music system' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'NAS' THEN 'NAS' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Network device' THEN 'Network device' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Printer' THEN 'Printer' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Switch' THEN 'Switch' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Webserver' THEN 'Webserver' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Windows' AND rships.Domainrole > 1 THEN 'WindowsServer' WHEN Dependant_AssetType = 'Windows' AND rships.Domainrole IN (0,1) THEN 'WindowsPC' ELSE Dependant_AssetType END AS Dependant_AssetType FROM (
--(cmdb_ci_win_server / cmdb_ci_ip_switch) SELECT DISTINCT CAST(switch.AssetID AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(switch.Mac)), '') AS Base_CorrelationID , switch.AssetName AS Base_Name , (SELECT SerialNumber FROM tblAssetCustom tac WHERE tac.AssetID = switch.AssetID) Base_SerialNumber , switch.Mac AS Base_MACAddress --, tblSNMPInfo.AssetMacAddress , 'IP Connection::IP Connection' relationship , CAST(Connected.AssetID AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(Connected.Mac)), '') AS Dependant_CorrelationID , connectedType.AssetTypename AS Dependant_AssetType , connected.AssetName AS Dependant_Name , (SELECT SerialNumber FROM tblAssetCustom tac WHERE tac.AssetID = connected.AssetID) Dependant_SerialNumber , connected.Mac AS Dependant_MACAddress , tblComputersystem.Domainrole FROM tblSNMPAssetMac tblSNMPInfo INNER JOIN tblAssets Connected on tblSNMPInfo.AssetMacAddress = Connected.Mac INNER JOIN tsysAssetTypes connectedType on connected.AssetType = connectedType.AssetType LEFT OUTER JOIN tblComputersystem ON Connected.AssetID = tblComputersystem.AssetID INNER JOIN tblAssets Switch on tblSNMPInfo.assetId = switch.AssetID INNER JOIN tsysAssetTypes switchType on switch.AssetType = switchType.AssetType WHERE tblSNMPInfo.AssetMacAddress IS NOT NULL AND tblSNMPInfo.AssetMacAddress <> '' AND connected.mac IS NOT NULL AND connected.mac <> '' AND switch.Mac <> connected.mac )rships
where Dependant_AssetType NOT IN ('ESXi server', 'Webserver', 'Music system', 'NAS', 'Network device', 'Citrix XenServer')
